name: Tank Battle Strike
description:
Tank Battle Strike! Hey Soldier! Do you like tank, simulator, free games ? If so, this is the right place for you. Use this heavy and most powerfull beast, destroy cities, vehicles, cars. Be the dream soldier and tank driver in this game. This game have the best locations of battlefield.

Control your tank over harsh and rugged desert terrain, shoot down fighter jets, and avoid snipers! We will be updating Tank Battle Strike frequently with new tanks, new maps, new weapons and new adventures for you! This free game has been optimized for special people like you are.

Take a try at this Tank Battle Strike and experience the rush and daring atmosphere of a battlefield full of armed vehicles, soldiers, explosives and an army at war. Drive the tanks and feel the immensity and power of these battlefield vehicles. Acceleration and braking in this tank simulator will show you how differently they operate.

Features:

• Amazing Futuristic Environment!
• Stunning 3D Graphics!
• Realistic Sound Effects!
• Lots of Enemy!
• Easy and Smooth Controls!
